name: Optmyzr
0:
”Alexa, Ask Optmyzr How Is My Account Doing?”
”Why Did Clicks Change?”
”Get Clicks For My Account”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: optmyzr
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Optmyzr skill on Alexa will keep you updated on the performance of your PPC accounts. It will report and analyze the performance for your accounts. You can also ask it to tell you by how much certain metrics like clicks or conversions changed and the reason behind the change.
